title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
4 points:

  • One point is earned for a correctly labeled graph of the market with a downward- sloping demand curve and upward sloping supply curve with the equilibrium identified as QM and PM.

  • One point is earned for showing a horizontal D and MR curve for the firm labeled DF and MRF

  • One point is earned for showing the profit-maximizing quantity, QF at MC=MR

  • One point is earned for showing the area representing economic profit, shaded
descriptions:

  • One point is earned for showing a horizontal D and MR curve for the firm labeled DF and MRF

  • One point is earned for showing the profit-maximizing quantity, QF at MC=MR

  • One point is earned for showing the area representing economic profit, shaded

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for stating that the number of firms will increase and for explaining that new firms will enter the market.

  • One point is earned for stating that the equilibrium price decreases or is lower than PM.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/2 point(s)

2 points:

  • One point is earned for stating that the number of firms will increase and for explaining that new firms will enter the market.

  • One point is earned for stating that the equilibrium price decreases or is lower than PM.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
4 points:

  • One point is earned for drawing a correctly labeled graph with a downward sloping demand curve, DL with the marginal revenue curve MRL below it.

  • One point is earned for drawing the average total cost curve, ATC, with the upward sloping marginal cost curve, MC passing through the lowest point of the ATC curve.

  • One point is earned for identifying the profit maximizing quantity, QL at MC=MR.

  • One point is earned for identifying the price, PL on the demand curve at QL and above ATC.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for a correctly labeled graph showing a long-run average total cost curve tangent to a downward-sloping demand curve.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)
